name: Nathan Allen
personality: Loyal and determined, Tally takes his duties as a soldier seriously. He is highly skilled with heavy weapons and will do everything he can to protect his fellow soldiers.
story: Tally joined the military when he was just 18 years old. He came from a long line of soldiers and wanted to continue the family tradition. Over the years, he has served in many different countries and has seen his fair share of combat. Despite the dangers, he has always been dedicated to his job and his fellow soldiers. Tally is now a family man with a wife and two children. He hopes to return home safely to his family after this deployment.
